body:
<!--StartFragment-->

Who said Christians can't have it all?\
\
Meet Cameroonian "Walt Disney", Mballa Amougou Marie; an evangelist, a gospel artist, and a filmmaker. Going by the acronym "MCM", she hails from the Ewondo tribe and was born and bred in Yaounde, Cameroon.\
\
Caught in a fast-changing world, the multi-talented beauty uses the trend to praise God through music and art.\
\
There are NO boundaries to the mandate her creator has given her. She refers her divine calling to Luke 4:18-19, and Colossians 3:16. She sure knows her Word!



[![](https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-7K9TCc-slzQ/XbQL99zkPvI/AAAAAAAAAps/Wtd9CBtQnBMoJdX_CHeeoOAkkOB-iql1gCLcBGAsYHQ/s320/IMG-20191025-WA0021.jpg)](https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-7K9TCc-slzQ/XbQL99zkPvI/AAAAAAAAAps/Wtd9CBtQnBMoJdX_CHeeoOAkkOB-iql1gCLcBGAsYHQ/s1600/IMG-20191025-WA0021.jpg)



Her debut album was released in July 2018, featuring music genres such as hip hop, techno and pop gospel. In addition to that, MCM released the first-ever episode of her web series\
\
"JÃ©sus parle aux enfants" translated "Jesus speaks to children", in September 2019



Not only does she have her eyes on the Canal d'Or award for the best gospel artist, but she has aspirations too.

> "In 2025...I would have produced 4 new albums, 100 episodes of my web series and 2 christian movies", she discloses.

\
Despite being hard pressed on every side by financial constraints, MCM is determined to solely fund her dream. What can we say, "nothing good comes easy". Click to the link to watch her music "Bloom Bloom"

<!--EndFragment-->
